Subsection.Text: If a terminal supplier, importer, blender, or wholesaler is unable to obtain fuel ethanol or blended gasoline at the same or lower price as unblended gasoline, then the sale or delivery of unblended gasoline by the terminal supplier, importer, blender, or wholesaler shall not be deemed a violation of this act. The terminal supplier, importer, blender, or wholesaler shall, upon request of the department, provide the required documentation regarding the sales transaction and price of fuel ethanol, blended gasoline, and unblended gasoline to the department.

To account for supply disruptions and ensure reliable supplies of motor fuels in the state, the requirements of this act shall be suspended when the provisions of s. 252.36(2) in any area of the state are in effect plus an additional 30 days.
